summary.span: 提供公钥加密标准 (PKCS) 的编程元素，包括用于数据签名、交换密钥、请求证书、公钥加密和解密的方法以及其他安全功能。

span.span: Provides programming elements for Public Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS), including methods for signing data, exchanging keys, requesting certificates, public key encryption and decryption, and other security functions.
